findings.title: Use of tx.origin for owner check
findings.explanation: The onlyOwner modifier uses tx.origin instead of msg.sender, which can be exploited through phishing: a malicious contract can trick the owner into calling it and then invoke onlyOwner functions on this contract.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use msg.sender for ownership checks. Change require(tx.origin == owner) to require(msg.sender == owner).

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in CashOut
findings.explanation: The function makes an external call with msg.sender.call.value(_am)() before updating the user's balance, allowing a malicious contract to re-enter CashOut and drain funds.
findings.fix_suggestion: Follow the checks-effects-interactions pattern by updating balances[msg.sender] before the external call, or use transfer/send which limit gas, or employ a reentrancy guard.

findings.title: Missing overflow checks on balance updates
findings.explanation: balances[msg.sender] += msg.value; can overflow for sufficiently large deposits, leading to incorrect account balances.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use a safe math library (e.g., OpenZeppelin's SafeMath) for all arithmetic operations to prevent overflows.

findings.title: Unbounded growth of log history leading to potential DoS
findings.explanation: The History array in the Log contract grows indefinitely. Once it becomes very large, pushing new entries may consume too much gas and eventually revert, disrupting logging functionality.
findings.fix_suggestion: Limit the size of stored history (e.g., use a fixed-size ring buffer) or emit events instead of storing logs on-chain.

findings.title: Deposits below minimum are accepted but not credited
findings.explanation: If msg.value < MinDeposit, the contract does nothing but still accepts the Ether, locking the funds in the contract with no way for the sender to withdraw.
findings.fix_suggestion: Revert the transaction when msg.value < MinDeposit by using require(msg.value >= MinDeposit); to prevent accidental loss of funds.

unmatched_predictions.title: Use of tx.origin for owner check
Missing overflow checks on balance updates
Unbounded growth of log history leading to potential DoS
Deposits below minimum are accepted but not credited
